item.title: Quick Tip: How to get the image version of an AVD Session Host?
item.description: When you want to identify which AVD session host is deployed from what image version there is a PowerShell module called AzAvd created by Sander Rozemuller that can help. The AzAVD module contains the Get-AvdImageVersionStatus command that helps to identify which AVD Session Host is deployed from what image version using the Azure Compute Gallery (ACG).

item.title: The latest technology news week 23-2023
item.description: Here’s the weekly latest technology news from Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD), Windows 365, and VMware. The main focus is based on Cloud and End User Computing (EUC) technology. Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) Nerdio Modeler for Azure Virtual Desktop. Modeler prompts for a handful of inputs and produces an easy-to-understand cost analysis, including auto-scale savings.

item.title: Optimize the Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) golden image automatically
item.description: For Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) there is an Optimization Tool available called Virtual Desktop Optimization Tool (VDOT). With this tool/script you optimize the following categories within an Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD): Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app cleanup Optional Features cleanup Local policy settings System services Scheduled tasks Apply Windows (and other) updates Automatic Windows traces Windows Defender optimization Client network performance tuning by registry settings Additional settings from the “Windows Restricted Traffic Limited Functionality Baseline” guidance.

item.title: Resources to prepare for the AZ-140 Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) exam
item.description: I’m preparing for the AZ-140 Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) exam. Update: June 10, 2021, the exam is out of beta and Generally Available (Link ). The following resources I’m using for studying for the exam: Exam AZ-140: Configuring and Operating Windows Virtual Desktop on Microsoft Azure – Skills Measured Exam AZ-140: Configuring and Operating Windows Virtual Desktop on Microsoft Azure website Deliver remote desktops and apps from Azure with Windows Virtual Desktop free training from Microsoft The AZ-140 exam can be taken online.
